title: Stuck On You (Duet)
lyrics:
[Chorus: Lionel Richie]
Stuck on you
I've got this feeling down deep in my soul that I just can't lose
Guess I'm on my way
Needed a friend
And the way I feel now I guess I'll be with you 'til the end
Guess I'm on my way
Mighty glad you stayed
[Verse 1: Darius Rucker & Lionel Richie]
I'm stuck on you
Been a fool too long I guess it's time for me to come on home
Guess I'm on my way
So hard to see
That a woman like you could wait around for a man like me
Guess I'm on my way
I'm mighty glad you stayed
Mighty-mighty glad
[Verse 2: Lionel Richie & Darius Rucker]
Oh, I'm leaving on that midnight train tomorrow
And I know just where I'm going
I've packed up my troubles and I've thrown them all away, oh yeah
'Cause this time little darling I'm coming home to stay

[Chorus: Lionel Richie & Darius Rucker]
I'm stuck on you
I've got this feeling down deep in my soul that I just can't lose
Guess I'm on my way
Needed a friend
And the way I feel now I guess I'll be with you 'til the end
Guess I'm on my way
I'm mighty glad you stayed
I'm mighty glad you stayed
